msg: Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
For Beta only, set mouseEnabled=false in the DefaultColumnHeaderRenderer so the mousing over the header doesn't give the impression it can be sorted or resized.
Fix RTE when DataGrid had focus and a key was pressed that neither the DataGrid or the Scroller handled.
Init the caret position to 0,0 if there is at least one row and one column.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

Worked on keyDownHandler for selection - a caret is required, fixed page-up/down, and dispatch unhandled keys to the scroller.  Fix column collection change event for REPLACE, and update the caret and hover index for all colum collection change events.
QE notes: This submit does not include the code to initialize the caret to 0,0.  That change will follow.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

The following bindable, read-only DataGrid and Grid properties are now writable: selectedIndex, selectedIndices, selectedCell, selectedCells, selectedItem, and selectedItems.  The property set methods are intended to enable developers to initialize the selection declaratively, they're not intended for programatic use.
DefaultGridItemRenderer uses createInFontContext() to create its text field to enable embedded fonts, RSLs.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

- ASdoc is not happy if there is a private variable/getter and a mx_internal variable/getter with the same name in the same class because of bug ASC-4110.  Fix instances of this in UICompoments and Grid.
- SDK-27169. Update the metadata for DG selectionMode.
- SDK-26840.  Turn off the column resize icon until the resize functionality is implemented.
- SDK-26548.  When TI is disabled, also disable RET.
- SDK-26858.  Fix off-by-1 bug in RET.adjustContentBoundsForScroller().  Comment in header was correct, code was not.

- SDK-26951 - For cell mode, preserve selection when REFRESH collection change event.  There is the restriction that if the collection if filtered, the preservedSelection becomes whatever is selected in the filtered collection.  If the filter is then removed, the original selection is not preserved.
QE notes: see restriction on SDK-26951 above
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
The default property of DataGrid is now dataProvider.
